data.title: Cerritos College Athletics
data.text:
Cerritos College Wrestling (2022): Went 17-11 on the year, which including posting a 17-10 record at 157 pounds… Qualified for the 3C2A State Championships and finished in eighth place after coming in third place at the Southern California Championships… Placed third at the Fresno City Tournament and West Hills Tournament, while he split his four matches at the Cuesta Tournament…..

Long Beach Millikan HS: Won the Moore League Championship four seasons in a row… Helped his team reach the finals of the CIF Team Duals three seasons in a row… Qualified for the Masters Meet as a junior at 126 pounds after coming in fourth place at the CIF Championships… Was a CIF qualifier as a sophomore and freshman… Was coached by his father… Spent four seasons on the wrestling team…..

Personal: Most memorable moments were being the first four-time league champion in league history and leading his team in pins… Aspires to work in health care… His brother Sean (22) wrestled at Long Beach Millikan High… Hobbies include playing video games and lifting weights… Is a member of his high school’s 1000-Pound Club… Is the son of Marshall and Keri Thompson… Born in Long Beach, CA on January 23, 2003…..

Favorite Athlete: Stephen Curry Favorite Movie: “Train to Buson”

Favorite Food: Pasta Bolognese Favorite TV Show: “The Walking Dead”
